name: Gmail - Khoi Edition
description:
Based on Khoi Vinh's redesign of GMail (from "Spacing is Everything":http://www.subtraction.com/archives/2008/0617_spacing_is_e.php at "subtraction.com":http://subtraction.com.

Adds some badly needed negative space to GMail's interface.

Experimental at the moment.  Screenshots coming soon.
